network_overview: The capture contains only 4 packets (215 B) exchanged on two private subnets—an HTTP TCP three-way handshake and a single UDP probe—both consistent with O&M heart-beats inside a lab or management VLAN; no 3GPP user-plane or signaling-plane traffic (GTP, Diameter, SIP, PFCP) is present.

observations.finding: 100 % of packets are management-plane (HTTP + UDP keep-alive); zero subscriber or control-plane protocols detected
No SIP, RTP or IMS traffic → no voice service observable in this slice

recommendations.action: Mirror a production S1-U or N3 interface to validate GTP-U encapsulation and user-plane KPIs
recommendations.rationale: Current capture is management-only; visibility into GTP tunnels is required for RAN/core troubleshooting

recommendations.action: Enable SCTP and PFCP decode on the capture point to verify 5GC CP-UP separation
recommendations.rationale: Ensures SMF/UPF session establishment and QoS enforcement can be audited

recommendations.action: Collect simultaneous SIP and RTP traces from the IMS VLAN when a VoLTE/VoNR call is placed
recommendations.rationale: Allows end-to-end voice-quality analysis (MOS, packet-loss, jitter) which is absent here

session_analysis.signaling_health: No 3GPP signaling detected; present traffic is TCP/UDP O&M heart-beats operating normally.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-U or NG-U tunnels observed; user-plane is outside the current capture scope.
session_analysis.voice_quality: No SIP, RTP or IMS protocols → voice service not measurable in this data set.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Only management plane visible; no correlation with user or signaling planes possible.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Mgmt as "O&M Agent\n192.168.1.1:1234"
    participant EM as "Element Manager\n192.168.1.2:80"
    participant Probe as "Keep-alive Sender\n10.0.0.1:5000"
    participant Target as "Target Host\n10.0.0.2:6000"
    Mgmt->>EM: TCP SYN
    EM->>Mgmt: TCP SYN-ACK
    Mgmt->>EM: TCP ACK
    Note over Mgmt,EM: 1.7 ms, 162 B — healthy mgmt exchange
    Probe->>Target: UDP 53 B probe
    Note over Probe,Target: single heartbeat, no reply captured
